snippet: SCHAEFFER--John. The New York Philharmonic mourns the passing, on May 30, of John Schaeffer, a member of the Orchestra, 1951-96, including his service as Principal Bass and Associate Personnel Manager, known for his warm, friendly smile and volumes of Philharmonic stories. We extend deepest condolences to his wife, Martha; children, Jennie and Joseph; step-children, Paul Nowinski, Janice Nowinski, and Deborah Melchor; daughter-in-law, Robin Nowinski; and grandchildren, Julie Melchor and Adam Melchor. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHAEFFER--John. The New York Philharmonic mourns the passing, on May 30, of John Schaeffer, a member of the Orchestra, 1951-96, including his service as Principal Bass and Associate Personnel Manager, known for his warm, friendly smile and volumes of Philharmonic stories. We extend deepest condolences to his wife, Martha; children, Jennie and Joseph; step-children, Paul Nowinski, Janice Nowinski, and Deborah Melchor; daughter-in-law, Robin Nowinski; and grandchildren, Julie Melchor and Adam Melchor. 1/3
